contentrichtext.text: '''Gerry Barr''' is the 1996 recipient of the [[Pearson Medal of Peace]] for the creation of the Steelworkers Humanity Fund. He is currently the National Executive Director and [[CEO]] of the [[Director's Guild of Canada]]. <ref>http://www.dgc.ca/en/leaders.cfm</ref> == External links == * [http://www.unac.org/en/news_events/pearson/1996.asp Pearson Medal of Peace - Gerry Barr] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Barr, Gerry | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Canadian philanthropist | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Barr, Gerry}} [[Category:Canadian philanthropists|Barr, Gerry]] [[Category:United Steelworkers|Barr, Gerry]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Canada-activist-stub}}
